How is the reconstruction of the garden of Blonier in Smallsk progressing?

Society♪1 day 3 hours ago

The bells no longer see how the Blonier is being reconstructed, as the contractors have banned the garden passage. It is surprising that large repairs take place at the height of winter, which may have a negative impact on the quality of the work.

Society♪1 day 3 hours ago

The bushes of Russia ' s heroes, members of the special military operation of the Guard to Senior Lieutenants Alexander Olegovic Bichaev and Dmitri Vasiljevic Belyaev opened the Day of Defence of the Fatherland. They appeared on the territory of the Military Air Defence Academy of the Marshal of the Soviet Union, A.M. Vasileski, where the military route of the officers began.
